articles.title: THIS Multiple Sclerosis (MS) symptom helped actor Selma Blair with her diagnosis - Times of India
articles.description: Selma Blair is a popular American actress known for her roles in Cruel Intentions and Hellboy. In October, 2018, when the actress revealed to the world that she was diagnosed with Multiple Sclerosis (MS), many people, especially women related to her. Since th…
articles.content: Out of the many symptoms that are associated with Multiple Sclerosis, Selma Blair in an interview discusses that one symptom that affected her, which went on to help her diagnose the condition in tim… [+843 chars]

articles.title: Prison Riot in Ecuador Leaves More Than 100 Dead, With Some Beheaded in Melee - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The riot between gangs at a crowded prison is the latest to shake Latin America, where mass killings by inmates aren’t uncommon
articles.content: More than 100 inmates were killed and dozens more injured in a riot in Ecuadors coastal city of Guayaquil, officials said, in the latest outbreak in Latin America of violence between gangs fighting f… [+397 chars]
